title: doc: Misprint in golang.org/doc/go1.html - "The http package" section
body:
by **strebkov**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Go to http://golang.org/doc/go1.html
2. Scroll down to "The http package" section

What is the expected output?
<...> The affected items are:

ClientConn
DumpRequest
DumpRequestOut
<...>

What do you see instead?
<...> The affected items are:

ClientConn
DumpRequest
DumpRequest
DumpRequestOut
<...>

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
not dependent on compiler

Which operating system are you using?
not dependent on operating system

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
http://golang.org (Go 1)
